<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

 </value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sorts all children of given path. Text of [[CT_TREE|Tree View]] entries is used for sorting. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control [[tvSort]] [path, reversed] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> p2</name>=<value> [path, reversed]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of the parent item to sort </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> p4</name>=<value> reversed (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to reverse sort it. Default: [[false]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>s2 </name>=<value>[[tvSort]] [idc, path, reversed] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [idc, path, reversed]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> p22</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - control idc </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> p23</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of the parent item to sort </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> p24</name>=<value> reversed (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to reverse sort it. Default: [[false]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>control [[tvSort]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0], [[true]]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[tvSort]] [102, [0], [[true]]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[tvSortAll]] [[tvSortByValue]] [[tvSortByValueAll]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
